Name: Handy Harry's Haunted House Services
About the game: Handy Harry's Haunted House Services is a online multiplayer coop horror game with a retro look. You and up to 7 other players are tasked with preforming some routine service work for a customer. Explore randomly generated , labyrinthian and spine-chilling levels in search of burnt out fuse boxes, broken floorboards and leaky pipes. Find them, fix them and do it quickly before the ghost that haunts the darkness catches you. But don't worry, with your trusty friends at your back and your (admittedly mediocre) flashlight by your side you'll be able to get the job done because here at Handy Harry's House Services we always get the job done, no matter the odds, and you better get it done otherwise you'll certainly meet a fate worse than death. Up to 8 player multiplayer: Simple to host and join games. Randomly generated levels: Every game is a new challenge. Randomized AI: You'll never be sure what you're facing. Proximity Voice Chat: You can scream, but will anyone be near enough to hear you? AI Generated Jumpscares: Never before seen! Every jumpscare is uniquely terrifying. Character customization: Escape alive to earn batteries that you can then spend at the shop with 70+ items. Have yourself look like a true professional! PvP mode: Try your hand at being the ghost and be the one to spook your friends. Endless mode: Clear floor after floor, soon you will all die but who will be the last to survive? Hardcore modifier: Enhance the difficulty of your games with larger levels, faster ghosts and no respawning. Will you make it out alive?
